isoorbi 0.1

    • Example Processing of an Orbitrap Iso file (.isox)

Calculate output table

Source: R/utils.R
orbi_calculate_output.Rd

Contains the logic to generate the output table

orbi_calculate_output(dataset, ratio.method)

Arguments

dataset

A processed data frame from IsoX output

ratio.method

Method for computing the ratio; passed to 'iso_calculate_ratio()'

Value

Returns table containing 'filename', 'sample.name', 'Basepeak', 'Compound', 'Isotopocule', 'Ratio', 'relSE.permill', 'shot.noise.permill', 'mins.to.1mio'

Examples

fpath <- system.file("extdata", "testfile_Flow_Exploration_small.isox", package="isoorbi")
df <- orbi_read_isox(filepath = fpath)
df <- df %>% orbi_simplify_isox() %>% orbi_basepeak(basepeak = "M0")
df <- df %>% orbi_calculate_output(ratio.method = "sum")
